translation.en: True!
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
translation.es: Con deseos para ti y para mí

translation.en: ♪ Hero, hero! ♪
♪ She's True! ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom! ♪
- - Hi, Mom.
Neverending Rainbow Day has started!
translation.es: Comenzó el Día del Arcoíris Sin Fin.

translation.en: I wish it really was neverending!
Could you imagine a full- time rainbow carnival?
translation.es: ¿Imaginas un carnaval sin fin de arcoíris?

translation.en: I think it means the rainbow is neverending, Bartleby, not the day.
translation.es: Creo que el arcoíris es sin fin, Bartleby, no el día.

translation.en: Hmm... where do we start, B?
Easy. Breakfast!
Pancakes. Yummy- yummy.
Mmm! Blue, green, yellow, red... Yup, they're all here.
translation.es: Azul, verde, amarillo, rojo. Sí, están todos.

translation.en: Bartleby, look! It's happening.
Happy Neverending Rainbow Day!
OK, what's next?
Let's try Rainbow Yeti Spaghetti.
How about the Rainbow Roller?
May I suggest a visit to Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight?
translation.es: Les sugiero el Diorama Dily-Daly de Deleite Deslumbrante.

translation.en: - Rainbow King! -
Happy Neverending Rainbow Day, your majesty.
translation.es: Feliz Día del Arcoíris Sin Fin, Su Majestad.

translation.en: And to you too, True and Bartleby.
So what's this dilly with the dazzly doodads...?
translation.es: ¿Qué es eso de las cosas deslumbrantes?

translation.en: Dillydally's Diorama of Dazzling Delight!
translation.es: El Diorama Dily-Daly de Deleite Deslumbrante

translation.en: It's full of the most wonderful treasures from all across the Kingdom.
translation.es: contiene los tesoros más maravillosos del reino.

translation.en: Like this zookalele.
My good friend Dillydally gave it to me.
translation.es: Mi buena amiga Dily-Daly me lo dio.

translation.en: You know Dillydally, the Great Explorer?
Indeed I do.
She is one of my dearest friends. And we both love music,
translation.es: Es una de mis grandes amigas y, como amamos la música,

translation.en: so she always brings me back a musical souvenir from her travels.
translation.es: ella siempre me trae un recuerdo musical de sus viajes.

translation.en: Can we meet her?
Oh, goodness, no.
Dillydally went on an adventure to find a magical instrument
translation.es: Dily-Daly fue a buscar un instrumento mágico

translation.en: at the end of the Neverending Rainbow last year.
translation.es: al final del Arcoíris Sin Fin el año pasado.

translation.en: She's been gone a whole year? No wonder they call her Dillydally.
translation.es: ¿Se fue todo un año? Con razón tiene fama de holgazana.

translation.en: Come to think of it, that is an awfully long time, even for Dillydally.
translation.es: Ahora que lo pienso, es muchísimo tiempo, incluso para Dily-Daly.

translation.en: I fear she may be... missing.
Missing!
We have to go find her.
Jumping juniper! It's far too dangerous, True.
Anyone who crosses the Neverending Rainbow must be prepared to face anything,
translation.es: Para cruzar el Arcoíris Sin Fin, hay que enfrentar muchas cosas

translation.en: and come back before sunset.
If anyone can find Dillydally and bring her back, it's me and Bartleby.
translation.es: Si alguien puede encontrarla y traerla de vuelta, somos nosotros.

translation.en: Very well.
But remember... at sunset the Neverending Rainbow will vanish for another year.
translation.es: Bueno. Pero recuerden, al atardecer, el Arcoíris Sin Fin desaparecerá por otro año.

translation.en: We'll move Kittynatti fast! Right, True?
First things first, we need some Wish help!
translation.es: Pero primero necesitamos ayuda de los deseos.

translation.en: Oh, Cumulo!
Thanks, Cumulo.
We'll get you back to the carnival in time for the next ride.
translation.es: Volverás a tiempo para el próximo paseo.

translation.en: To the Wishing Tree, please.
OK, Wishes. From the top...
Musical Wishes!
True, Bartleby! You like jazz?
Listen to this!
We'd love to, Zee, but we're in a real hurry.
Yeah! We're going over the Neverending Rainbow. To find Dillydally.
translation.es: - Iremos al Arcoíris Sin Fin. - A encontrar a Dily-Daly.

translation.en: The Great Explorer? As I remember, she never came back from her last expedition.
translation.es: La gran exploradora. Nunca regresó de su última expedición.

translation.en: Right. So we're heading over the Rainbow to find her.
translation.es: Sí, por eso iremos al Arcoíris a buscarla.

translation.en: That means you will have to come back by the end of the day.
translation.es: O sea que deberán regresar al atardecer.

translation.en: What if you get stuck on the other side too?
We do have to hurry, Zee, but we'll be just fine, as long as we have the right Wish help.
translation.es: Debemos apurarnos, pero estaremos bien gracias a la deseo-ayuda

translation.en: Absolutely!
Let's sit... and have a think.
OK True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede ayudarte el Árbol de los Deseos?

translation.en: Well, maybe Dillydally didn't come back
translation.es: Bueno, tal vez Dily-Daly no regresó porque está atrapada

translation.en: because she's trapped or needs some kind of help...
translation.es: Bueno, tal vez Dily-Daly no regresó porque está atrapada o necesita algo de ayuda.

translation.en: We have to be prepared for anything.
Right, we don't know what you might find over the Rainbow.
translation.es: Claro, no sabemos qué puede haber.

translation.en: We might not know, but the Wishing Tree always shares the right Wishes.
translation.es: Sí, pero el Árbol de los Deseos siempre nos da los deseos correctos.

translation.en: Then it's up to me to figure out how to use them.
translation.es: Dependerá de mí descubrir cómo usarlos.

translation.en: You always do, True.
The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
translation.es: El Árbol de los Deseos te ha escuchado.

translation.en: It is time to get your three Wishes. I'm ready!
translation.es: - Es hora de concederte tus tres deseos. - Estoy lista.

translation.en: Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree, please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
translation.es: ¡Arbolito de los Deseos, por favor, compartirlos quiero!

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪ Boo- ster!
♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
Whompit!
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
translation.es: Que tu magia - Yo quiero ver - ¡Korokoro!

translation.en: Korokoro!
♪ Magic power ♪
♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
What an exciting ensemble of Wishes!
Now let's see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.es: Veamos qué dice la Deseopedia de ellos.

translation.en: This is Boo- ster.
Boo- ster!
This one will really blow you away.
Boo- ster can take a big breath and blow out a super- powerful jet of air.
translation.es: Búster inhala profundo y sopla un chorro de aire poderoso.

translation.en: I can't wait to see you in action, Boo- ster.
Who do we have next?
Oh yes, this is Whompit.
Whompit!
As you know, Whompit is a stomping Wish that just loves to stomp and smash the ground.
translation.es: Como saben, Wómpit es un deseo pisotón que ama pisotear el suelo.

translation.en: Nice to see you again, Whompit.
I don't know when we'll need your help, but I'm sure we'll have a smashing good time!
translation.es: No sé cuándo te necesitaremos, pero lo pasaremos genial.

translation.en: Whompit!
And finally, we have Korokoro.
- Korokoro. - A super rare Wish.
Korokoro has grippy powers.
It can help you walk on really slippery surfaces.
Amazing! I'm glad to have you with us, Korokoro.
translation.es: Increíble. Me alegra que nos acompañes.

translation.en: Korokoro!
Are you three ready for an adventure on the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.es: ¿Están listos para una aventura en el Arcoíris Sin Fin?

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.es: ¡Zup, zip, zila, deseos a mi mochila!

translation.en: Thanks, Zee. We'll be back soon.
I'm counting on it.
Thanks, Cumulo! You should get back to the Carnival. We can walk from here.
translation.es: Gracias, Cúmulo. Vuelve al carnaval. Seguiremos a pie.

translation.en: Yeah, it'll be nice to stretch our legs a bit...
translation.es: Sí, así estiramos un poco las piernas.

translation.en: Besides, how long could it take to cross the Neverending Rainbow?
translation.es: Además, no tardaremos mucho en cruzar el Arcoíris Sin Fin.

translation.en: Skyblubbs? We must be really high up.
When are we going to get to the end of this neverending rainbow?
I can't believe Dillydally came all this way by herself.
translation.es: No puedo creer que Dily-Daly haya venido sola.

translation.en: I wonder what she was hoping to find.
I'm hoping to find the world's biggest zazoony juice.
translation.es: Espero encontrar el mejor jugo de zazoony.

translation.en: Mmm... super frosty with lots of ice cubes and-- A fork!
Um, I think a straw might work better for zazoony juice, True.
translation.es: Creo que con un solo jugo me alcanza.

translation.en: No, it's a fork in the rainbow. Look!
translation.es: No. El arcoíris se divide en dos. Mira.

translation.en: - Huh? - Which way should we go?
I've got this, True.
My tail always knows which way to go...
translation.es: Mi cola siempre sabe por dónde ir.

translation.en: That- a- way!
Why did your tail pick that path?
Easy. That other path has stairs.
Good call, tail. Let's go.
Well, it's nothing but smooth sailing from here on out.
translation.es: Bueno, ahora sí el camino parece fácil.

translation.en: Right, True?
Uh- oh. What do you mean, uh- oh?
Oh, dear.
It's like walking a tightrope.
translation.es: Es como caminar por la cuerda floja.

translation.en: We just need to walk slow and steady.
- I got you, True! - Phew! Thanks.
This is trickier than I thought...
Ha! Not for a red- tabby Kittynatti. Watch me, OK? And then just do what I do.
translation.es: Pero yo tengo el cinturón rojo atigrado. Mira y copia lo que hago.

translation.en: See True? Easy peasy, rainbow squeezy!
Hang on, B!
- I gotcha! - Phew.
You OK, Bartleby?
I am now. But I don't think I could have held myself up much longer.
translation.es: Ahora sí, pero no creo poder sostenerme mucho más.

translation.en: Whoa! We're high!
This could work if we do it together.
I'll hold you up, and you hold me up, OK?
translation.es: Yo te sostendré y tú me sostendrás, ¿sí?

translation.en: OK, you got it.
Steady...
Easy...
- OK, come on. - OK.
You can do it, True! Just don't look down! 'Cause we're up so high, and you don't want to get dizzy.
translation.es: Puedes hacerlo. No mires hacia abajo porque estamos muy alto y te marearás.

translation.en: You don't even want to think about falling 'cause it'll be like...
translation.es: Ni siquiera debes pensar en caer porque...

translation.en: Oh, I can't look!
- Done. - What?
We're here. We made it.
We did it! Go Teamwork, right?
Thanks, B. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation.es: Gracias. No lo hubiera hecho sin ti.

translation.en: And look, we're almost at the top of the Rainbow.
translation.es: Y mira, casi llegamos a la cima.

translation.en: Yeah, we can handle anything this wacky Rainbow can throw at us.
translation.es: Afrontaremos lo que el arcoíris nos...

translation.en: And I spoke too soon.
Come on, we'd better be quick if we're going to beat that storm.
translation.es: Vamos. De prisa, pasemos la tormenta.

translation.en: - - Excuse me. Hi!
We really need to get to the other side of the rainbow.
translation.es: Debemos llegar al otro lado del arcoíris.

translation.en: Could you please let us through?
Aw, you're stuck and you're too full of rain to move?
What do we do, True?
We can't just stroll through a lightening cloud.
One wrong move and...
Not if we use some Wish power to blow it away.
Time for my first Wish!
translation.es: Es hora de mi primer deseo.

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Boo- ster, Wish come true!
Hi, Boo- ster. See that big storm cloud over there?
translation.es: Hola, Búster. ¿Ves esa gran nube de tormenta?

translation.en: It's stuck on the rainbow and it needs our help.
Let's give it a push with your super strong wind!
translation.es: Démosle un empujón con tu viento superfuerte.

translation.en: OK, Boo- ster... Blow, blow...
blow!
- Look, it's-- - Ticklish.
One more time, Boo- ster.
- You're welcome. - Thanks for not zapping us.
translation.es: - De nada. - Gracias por no electrocutarnos.

translation.en: Great job, Boo- ster! Now back in the pack!
translation.es: Buen trabajo, Búster. Ahora vuelve a la mochila.

translation.en: Whoa! Be careful, B. It's a little slippery...
translation.es: Ten cuidado, Bee. Está un poco resbaladizo...

translation.en: Uh, True?
I know this is fun and all...
but we don't have any brakes!
Prepare for a crash landing!
We made it, B! This is the end of the Rainbow.
translation.es: Lo logramos. Este es el final del Arcoíris.

translation.en: Dillydally must be somewhere on this island!
translation.es: Dily-Daly debe estar en algún lugar de esta isla.

translation.en: - Hello! - Dillydally! Are you here?
Listen. Do you hear a tink- tink- tink?
You must have cat ears, True.
I tink- tink- tink the tink- tink- tink is coming from over there!
translation.es: ¡Creo que el tilín, tilín viene de allá!

translation.en: - - Bartleby, look!
It's her... Dillydally!
Huh? What?
Oh my! Are you two lost?
No, we're here to find you!
I'm True, and this is Bartleby. We're friends of the Rainbow King.
translation.es: Somos Vera y Bartleby, amigos del rey Arcoíris.

translation.en: Bouncing bongos!
Any friend of the Rainbow King is a friend of mine.
translation.es: Todo amigo del rey Arcoíris es mi amigo.

translation.en: ♪ Welcome to the rainbow's end ♪ ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you, friends ♪
translation.es: Bienvenidos al final del arcoíris Me alegra verlos, amigos

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪ ♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
translation.es: Escuchen y observen Ojos azules y orejas moradas

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
Oh, dear.
♪ Oh dingle- dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.es: Din don, algo va mal Necesito esa nota para tocar

translation.en: ♪ Could use a stick un- stucker tool ♪ ♪ To help un- stuck that fuchsia jewel ♪
translation.es: Podría usar algo Para quitar esa joya fucsia

translation.en: ♪ I pucker up and give a blow... ♪
No!
♪ Oh dingle- dong There's something wrong ♪ ♪ I need that toot to toot along ♪
translation.es: Din don, algo va mal Necesito esa nota para tocar

translation.en: ♪ I tink tink tink and tonk tonk tonk ♪ ♪ But no tink tonk will move that rock ♪
translation.es: Hago tilín, tilín y tolón, tolón Pero no se mueve

translation.en: ♪ It's my Dillydally kazoofa- flute And all it needs now is a... ♪
translation.es: Es mi flauta kazúfal Y solo necesita...

translation.en: - Whoo- hoo! - Bravo! That was so fun.
Rainbow King would've loved that song.
Oh, Rainbow King... I miss him ever so dearly.
translation.es: Ay, el rey Arcoíris. Lo extraño muchísimo.

translation.en: I haven't seen him for a whole year.
translation.es: Hace un año que no lo veo.

translation.en: I could never be away from True that long. But you're in luck!
translation.es: No podría dejar a Vera tanto tiempo, pero tienes suerte.

translation.en: Because he sent us to find you and help get you home.
translation.es: Porque nos envió a llevarte de regreso.

translation.en: Don't be a silly slide whistle!
I'm not lost. I chose to stay here.
translation.es: No me perdí. Decidí quedarme aquí.

translation.en: I was collecting these magical crystals
translation.es: Juntaba cristales mágicos para hacer una flauta kazúfal

translation.en: to make a kazoofa- flute as a souvenir for Rainbow King.
translation.es: Juntaba cristales mágicos para hacer una flauta kazúfal para el rey Arcoíris.

translation.en: But the very last crystal just won't budge so I'm missing a note.
translation.es: Pero el último cristal no sale, así que me falta una nota.

translation.en: And I am not leaving without it.
translation.es: Y no me iré sin ella.

translation.en: What kind of a friend would I be if I brought home a half- finished souvenir?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de amiga sería si le regalara algo sin terminar?

translation.en: I do not think she's coming with us any time soon. Nuh- uh.
translation.es: No creo que regrese con nosotros.

translation.en: We came here to rescue Dillydally, and we're not going home without her.
translation.es: Vinimos a rescatar a Dily-Daly y no regresaremos sin ella.

translation.en: Uh, well we'd better hurry, True.
The sun's gonna set soon and you, me and Dillydally will be stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.es: Atardecerá y quedaremos atascados hasta el próximo Día del Arcoíris Sin Fin.

translation.en: OK, if Dillydally won't leave without the last crystal,
translation.es: Bien, si Dily-Daly no puede irse sin el último cristal,

translation.en: maybe we can help get it out. Time for my second Wish!
translation.es: le ayudaremos a sacarlo. ¡Hora de mi segundo deseo!

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Whompit!
- Whompit! - Wish come true!
Hi, Whompit!
We need your whompin', stompin' power to shake a crystal loose.
translation.es: Necesitamos tu poder pisoteador para sacar un cristal.

translation.en: Whomp, whomp!
OK everybody, watch out!
- - Clapping castanets! What was that?
Whompit's going to help you get that crystal out.
You might wanna stay off the ground for a little bit.
translation.es: Mejor si te corres de ahí.

translation.en: Hop on!
Alright, Whompit.
Let's stomp, stomp, stomp it!
Almost!
Way to stomp it, Whompit!
Now back in the pack!
Whomp, whomp!
Wow! It made the rainbow glow.
That's the power of the Rainbow Crystals!
translation.es: Es el poder de los cristales arcoíris.

translation.en: Isn't this is the perfect souvenir for Rainbow King?
translation.es: ¿No es el recuerdo perfecto para el rey?

translation.en: He's going to love it, Dillydally.
And we're going to give it to him today, right?
As in before the sun goes down?
We might be too late!
Without the sun, there will be no rainbow to take us home!
translation.es: Sin el sol, no habrá arcoíris que nos lleve a casa.

translation.en: Come on! Let's get moving.
It's way too steep.
Not for my super Kittynati rainbow grip!
translation.es: ¡No para mi superagarre arcoíris de Gatinati!

translation.en: Remind me to sharpen my claws next time.
translation.es: Me afilaré las garras la próxima.

translation.en: Is there another way off this island, Dillydally?
translation.es: ¿Hay otra forma de salir de esta isla?

translation.en: I was going to figure that part out after I got the crystal.
translation.es: Iba a descubrirlo después de quitar el cristal.

translation.en: So we're stuck here until next Neverending Rainbow Day?
translation.es: ¿Quedaremos atrapados hasta el próximo Día del Arcoíris Sin Fin?

translation.en: Look on the bright side. We finished the kazoofa- flute!
translation.es: Mira el lado positivo. Tenemos la flauta kazúfal.

translation.en: What? I didn't even bring any Fishy Poof Crackers!
No!
Still so many Fishy Poof flavors to try!
translation.es: ¡Todavía quedan muchos sabores de pescado por probar!

translation.en: Come now, Bartleby. Get a grip on yourself.
That's it!
I have just the thing to help us get a grip.
It's time for my third Wish!
translation.es: Es hora de mi tercer deseo.

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Korokoro!
Wish come true!
Hi, Korokoro!
We need your help to climb to the top of that super steep rainbow.
translation.es: Ayúdanos a subir a la cima de ese arcoíris muy empinado.

translation.en: Korokoro!
Go, Korokoro!
Come on, hop in.
Now, we all need to run as fast as we can.
translation.es: Debemos correr tan rápido como podamos.

translation.en: It's working!
Um, why is the Rainbow flickering?
The sun is setting.
We're running out of time!
Faster, everyone, faster!
Whoo- hoo! We made it to the top of the Rainbow! No more climbing!
translation.es: Llegamos a la cima del arcoíris. No más escalada.

translation.en: It's all downhill from here!
I can see Rainbow City.
The rainbow is fading!
We're not gonna make it!
Dillydally! Your kazoofa- flute.
Can you play it to keep the rainbow glowing?
You betcha!
I should never have let them go over the Rainbow...
translation.es: No debí dejarlos subir al arcoíris.

translation.en: Oh, gruesome grey, I miss them so much.
Wait! Could it be... ?
It's too late. The rainbow's gone.
translation.es: Es tarde. Ya no hay arcoíris.

translation.en: Oh no!
We're not going to make it, I don't think!
Cumulo!
Terrific tambourines! You saved us.
Of all the cushy, fluffy things I love... you're the best!
translation.es: De todas las cosas suaves y mullidas que amo, eres la mejor.

translation.en: Thanks, Cumulo! I knew I could always count on you.
translation.es: Gracias, Cúmulo. Sabía que podía contar contigo.

translation.en: You too, Korokoro.
Korokoro!
- Now back in the pack. - Whoo- hoo!
Grateful green!
Dillydally!
Rainbow King!
I missed you so much.
I was so worried about you, old friend.
I'm sorry I was away so long.
But I just couldn't come home without a special treasure...
translation.es: Lamento haberme ido tanto tiempo, pero no podía regresar sin un tesoro especial

translation.en: for you.
Fantastic fuchsia!
A Kazoofa- flute!
But Dillydally, as wonderful as your souvenirs are,
translation.es: Por más maravillosos que sean tus regalos,

translation.en: there's no greater treasure than a true friend.
translation.es: no hay mayor tesoro que una verdadera amiga.

translation.en: Oh, Rainbow King, you're so right.
And I have two new friends who cared enough to come look for me.
translation.es: Y tengo dos nuevos amigos que se ocuparon de venir a buscarme.

translation.en: I'm sorry you missed your Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.es: Lamento que se hayan perdido el festejo.

translation.en: Well, not the whole day.
You didn't miss the grand finale.
translation.es: No te perdiste el gran final.

translation.en: Rocketing red and booming blue, a special sight for me and you!
translation.es: Rojo radiante, azul ardiente, regálanos una vista estridente.

translation.en: Here it comes! The best part of Neverending Rainbow Day.
translation.es: Aquí viene, la mejor parte del Día del Arcoíris Sin Fin.

translation.en: Fill the sky with wondrous light,
translation.es: Llena el cielo de luz sorprendente.

translation.en: find a friend and hug them tight!
translation.es: Busca a un amigo y abrázalo fuerte.

translation.en: ♪ Welcome to the Rainbow's End ♪ ♪ I'm tickled pink to see you friend ♪
translation.es: Bienvenidos al final del arcoíris Me alegra verlos, amigos

translation.en: ♪ Now listen up and lookie here ♪
♪ With big blue eyes and purple ears ♪
♪ I pucker up and give a blow ♪
Oh.
